title: React
description: React is the library for web and native user interfaces. Build user interfaces out of individual pieces called components written in JavaScript.

items.title: React - MDN
items.description: This brings us to the end of our initial look at React, including how to install it locally, creating a starter app, and how the basics work. In the next article, we'll start building our first proper application â€” a todo list. Before we do that, however, let's recap some of the things we've learned.

items.title: React - W3schools
items.description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
